note.p: Career: MP for Launceston (1661); MP for Cornwall (1679-1681); Commissioner for Assessment for Cornwall (1663-1680), for Devon (1673-1680), and for Hampshire (1679-1680); Member, Society of Mines Royal (1669), Deputy Governor (1670-1672), Assistant (1678-death); Deputy-Lieutenant of Cornwall (1670-death), and of Devon (1676-death); Commissioner for Recusants for Cornwall (1675); expelled from the Royal Society (1685)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Hunter; Foster; Henning
